Detailed Description

Static methods to augment the general UBLAS library methods.

void libpg::UBlasExtras::updateInverseMatrix ( Matrix &  inverse,
Vector &  c,
Vector &  d 
) [static]

Use Sherman-Morrison fomular to update inverse of a Matrix Formula: (A+cd')^-1 = A^-1 - (A^-1cd'A^-1) / (1+d'A^-1c)

Parameters:
A^-1 from previous step
vector c as in A_{t+1} = A_t + cd^T
vector d as in A_{t+1} = A_t + cd^T

size_t libpg::UBlasExtras::rank ( Matrix &  A  )  [static]

Compute rank of matrix based on SVD. Does not cope with noise beyond simple threshold for errors at machine precision level.

Parameters:
Matrix to take SVD of. Rank will be less or equal to smallest diim
Returns:
rank >= 0, <= size of smallest dim of A.

Matrix & libpg::UBlasExtras::pseudoInverse ( Matrix &  A,
Matrix &  Ainv 
) [static]

Compute pseudo inverse from SVD. If A = USB', where S is diagonal, then pseudo inverse is Ainv = BS^{-1}A'
